1.label: Square 1
1.modalBody: Modal body 1: Donec et urna vel risus feugiat pharetra. Proin id lacus vitae velit accumsan venenatis. Aenean non mi vel nisi lacinia maximus. Duis efficitur, sapien quis bibendum auctor, lectus risus feugiat sapien, ac pulvinar orci est a arcu. Integer id augue vitae urna tristique tempus.

poem-intro.title: I am Tulamia D. Luffy.
poem-intro.description: Heya! I'm Luffy! Nice to meet yaâ€”let's be friends right now! ğŸ˜„ This website? It's like my ship: full of adventures, surprises, and dreamsâ€”hop on and explore with me, 'cause I'm the guy who'll be the Pirate King, and this place is where we start our journey together! ğŸŒŠ

tech-stack.title: Yohoho! I'm Luffy, captain of this crazy pirate crew AND this website!
tech-stack.description:
Yohoho! I'm Luffy, captain of this crazy pirate crew AND this website! ğŸ˜†
Here's how my team sails the tech seasâ€”'cause building this place is just like heading to the Grand Line!

ğŸ›³ ğŸŸ§ TYPO3 â€“ Thousand Sunny
That's our ship! Strong, flexible, always ready for adventure. Built to sail any storm!
ğŸ¶ React â€“ Chopper
Fast, bouncy, transforming all the time to heal bugs and keep things cute and dynamic!
ğŸ§  Gemini 1.0 â€“ Usopp
Always imagining thingsâ€¦ sometimes drifts into hallucinationsâ€”but hey, creativity is important! ğŸ¨
ğŸ’ª Apache â€“ Franky
Super sturdy engine room! Powers everything underneathâ€”NEE-SUPER! ğŸ”§
ğŸ– PHP â€“ Sanji
Cooking up backend logic with precision, serving delicious code straight to your browser!
ğŸ—º Documentation â€“ Zoro
Tries to help you find the wayâ€¦ but sometimes still gets lost in folders ğŸ¤£. Still, essential for navigation!
â› Composer â€“ Robin
Quietly builds dependencies and connects everything from the shadowsâ€”scholarly and super efficient.
ğŸ‡ Grunt â€“ Brook
Very old but still alive somehow! Goes "Yohohoho!" every time it runs a task. ğŸ»ğŸ’€
ğŸ”¥ Vite â€“ Ace (spirit of fire)
Fast, blazing hot development! Lights up your workflow in seconds!
âš™ Webpack â€“ Jinbe
Reliable, strong, and manages heavy stuff in productionâ€”stable like the sea itself!
ğŸ”€ Git â€“ Law (honorary crew)
Cuts through versions like ROOM! Keeps everything under control during rough deployments.
ğŸŸ MySQL â€“ Fishman Island
Deep database power below sea-level, storing all the treasure securely!
ğŸ«§ Docker â€“ Bubble Coating
Keeps our ship safe while we dive into any environmentâ€”just wrap it and go underwater! ğŸŒŠ
ğŸ“¡ Server & Networking â€“ Nami
Predicts traffic storms, optimizes routes, keeps everything running smooth and profitable ğŸ’°âš¡
âŒš CI/CD â€“ Jinbe + Franky tag team
Strong and steady automated releases that keep us cruising forward!

So yeah! This website's built by MY CREWâ€”the strongest in both seas AND dev world!
Join us, let's create, break limits, and sail toward the futureâ€”
'CAUSE I'M MONKEY D. LUFFY, THE MAN WHO'LL BE THE PIRATE KINGâ€¦ AND THIS IS THE TECH SHIP THAT'LL TAKE US THERE! ğŸ´â€â˜ ï¸ğŸ”¥ğŸ’»ğŸŒŠ
Let's set sail! ğŸš€
